mapper.select: select id, name, env_id, project_id, timout_time, fail_continue, flags, params, case_vars, case_type, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from galloping_snail.t_testcase_ui_new where id = #{id}

select id, name, env_id, project_id, timout_time, fail_continue, flags, params, case_vars, case_type, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from galloping_snail.t_testcase_ui_new limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into galloping_snail.t_testcase_ui_new(name, env_id, project_id, timout_time, fail_continue, flags, params, case_vars, case_type, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{envId}, #{projectId}, #{timoutTime}, #{failContinue}, #{flags}, #{params}, #{caseVars}, #{caseType}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update galloping_snail.t_testcase_ui_new
name = #{name},
env_id = #{envId},
project_id = #{projectId},
timout_time = #{timoutTime},
fail_continue = #{failContinue},
flags = #{flags},
params = #{params},
case_vars = #{caseVars},
case_type = #{caseType},
remark = #{remark},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
